name: Supernatural Shenanigans
description:
Dive into the world of "Supernatural Shenanigans," a heart-pounding 2-player online co-op game!

Each game is a unique journey into the unknown, with a constantly changing landscape of puzzles. Your mission? To find out which Entity lurks behind the local cultists' deeds.

Gather evidence, consult your guides, solve logic puzzles, and revert the ritual before time runs out. Just one detail: the Entity will hunt you too. Yes, laughs and screams guaranteed.

Key Features:

  • Ever-Changing Clues and Tasks: Each match is unique, as it brings new clues to decipher and critical tasks to complete, to keep eerie and evil stuff away.
  • Interactive and Comprehensive Tutorial: Daunting? Perhaps. Impossible? Never. Our detailed, interactive tutorial will transform you from a novice to a master Supernatural Detective.
  • Many Cosmetics: Express your detective style with a range of unlockable skins. Play, progress, and personalize your character to make your shenanigans stand out.

More to Come:

As we go through the Early Access phase, we will constantly drop more content, such as new Entities, Clues, Tools, Tasks, Skins and Maps!

Stay in the loop and join the adventure by connecting with us on our Discord Server! Your feedback and participation are invaluable as we shape this thrilling world together!
